verses.verse: תְּפִלָּ֗ה <WH8605> A Prayer לְדָ֫וִ֥ד <WH1732> of David שִׁמְעָ֤ה <WH8085> Hear יְהוָ֨ה ׀ <WH3068> O LORD צֶ֗דֶק <WH6664> the right הַקְשִׁ֥יבָה <WH7181> attend רִנָּתִ֗י <WH7440> unto my cry הַאֲזִ֥ינָה <WH238> give ear תְפִלָּתִ֑י <WH8605> unto my prayer בְּ֝לֹ֗א <WH3808> [that goeth] not שִׂפְתֵ֥י <WH8193> lips מִרְמָֽה׃ <WH4820> out of feigned

מִ֭לְּפָנֶיךָ <WH6440> from thy presence מִשְׁפָּטִ֣י <WH4941> Let my sentence יֵצֵ֑א <WH3318> come forth עֵ֝ינֶ֗יךָ <WH5869> let thine eyes תֶּחֱזֶ֥ינָה <WH2372> behold מֵישָׁרִֽים׃ <WH4339> the things that are equal

בָּ֘חַ֤נְתָּ <WH974> Thou hast proved לִבִּ֨י ׀ <WH3820> mine heart פָּ֘קַ֤דְתָּ <WH6485> thou hast visited לַּ֗יְלָה <WH3915> [me] in the night צְרַפְתַּ֥נִי <WH6884> thou hast tried בַל־ <WH1077> nothing תִּמְצָ֑א <WH4672> me [and] shalt find זַ֝מֹּתִ֗י <WH2161> nothing I am purposed בַּל־ <WH1077> nothing יַעֲבָר־ <WH5674> shall not transgress פִּֽי׃ <WH6310> [that] my mouth

לִפְעֻלּ֣וֹת <WH6468> Concerning the works אָ֭דָם <WH120> of men בִּדְבַ֣ר <WH1697> by the word שְׂפָתֶ֑יךָ <WH8193> of thy lips אֲנִ֥י <WH589> I שָׁ֝מַ֗רְתִּי <WH8104> I have kept אָרְח֥וֹת <WH734> [me from] the paths פָּרִֽיץ׃ <WH6530> of the destroyer
תָּמֹ֣ךְ <WH8551> Hold up אֲ֭שֻׁרַי <WH838> my goings בְּמַעְגְּלוֹתֶ֑יךָ <WH4570> in thy paths בַּל־ <WH1077> have not נָמ֥וֹטּוּ <WH4131> slip פְעָמָֽי׃ <WH6471> [that] my footsteps

אֲנִֽי־ <WH589> I קְרָאתִ֣יךָ <WH7121> I have called כִֽי־ <WH3588> for תַעֲנֵ֣נִי <WH6030> upon thee for thou wilt hear אֵ֑ל <WH410> me O God הַֽט־ <WH5186> incline אָזְנְךָ֥ <WH241> thine ear לִ֝֗י שְׁמַ֣ע <WH8085> unto me [and hear אִמְרָתִֽי׃ <WH565> ] my speech

הַפְלֵ֣ה <WH6395> Shew thy marvellous חֲ֭סָדֶיךָ <WH2617> lovingkindness מוֹשִׁ֣יעַ <WH3467> O thou that savest חוֹסִ֑ים <WH2620> them which put their trust מִ֝מִּתְקוֹמְמִ֗ים <WH6965> [in thee] from those that rise up בִּֽימִינֶֽךָ׃ <WH3225> by thy right hand

שָׁ֭מְרֵנִי <WH8104> Keep כְּאִישׁ֣וֹן <WH380> me as the apple בַּת־ <WH1323> first עָ֑יִן <WH5869> of the eye בְּצֵ֥ל <WH6738> me under the shadow כְּ֝נָפֶ֗יךָ <WH3671> of thy wings תַּסְתִּירֵֽנִי׃ <WH5641> hide

מִפְּנֵ֣י <WH6440> From רְ֭שָׁעִים <WH7563> the wicked ז֣וּ <WH2098> that שַׁדּ֑וּנִי <WH7703> oppress אֹיְבַ֥י <WH341> enemies בְּ֝נֶ֗פֶשׁ <WH5315> me [from] my deadly יַקִּ֥יפוּ <WH5362> [who] compass me about עָלָֽי׃ <WH5921> and
חֶלְבָּ֥מוֹ <WH2459> in their own fat סָּגְר֑וּ <WH5462> They are inclosed פִּ֝֗ימוֹ <WH6310> with their mouth דִּבְּר֥וּ <WH1696> they speak בְגֵאֽוּת׃ <WH1348> proudly

אַ֭שֻּׁרֵינוּ <WH838> us in our steps עַתָּ֣ה <WH6258> have now [סְבָבוּנִי כ] (סְבָב֑וּנוּ <WH5437> make ק) עֵינֵיהֶ֥ם <WH5869> their eyes יָ֝שִׁ֗יתוּ <WH7896> they have set לִנְט֥וֹת <WH5186> bowing down בָּאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> to the earth

דִּמְיֹנ֗וֹ <WH1825> Like כְּ֭אַרְיֵה <WH738> as a lion יִכְס֣וֹף <WH3700> [that] is greedy לִטְר֑וֹף <WH2963> of his prey וְ֝כִכְפִ֗יר <WH3715> and as it were a young lion יֹשֵׁ֥ב <WH3427> lurking בְּמִסְתָּרִֽים׃ <WH4565> in secret places

קוּמָ֤ה <WH6965> Arise יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> O LORD קַדְּמָ֣ה <WH6923> disappoint פָ֭נָיו <WH6440> him הַכְרִיעֵ֑הוּ <WH3766> cast him down פַּלְּטָ֥ה <WH6403> deliver נַ֝פְשִׁ֗י <WH5315> my soul מֵרָשָׁ֥ע <WH7563> from the wicked חַרְבֶּֽךָ׃ <WH2719> [which is] thy sword

מִֽמְתִ֥ים <WH4962> From men יָדְךָ֨ ׀ <WH3027> [which are] thy hand יְהוָ֡ה <WH3068> O LORD מִֽמְתִ֬ים <WH4962> from men מֵחֶ֗לֶד <WH2465> of the world חֶלְקָ֥ם <WH2506> [which have] their portion בַּֽחַיִּים֮ <WH2416> in [this] life [וּצְפִינְךָ כ] (וּֽצְפוּנְךָ֮ <WH6840> hid ק) תְּמַלֵּ֪א <WH4390> thou fillest בִ֫טְנָ֥ם <WH990> and whose belly יִשְׂבְּע֥וּ <WH7646> [treasure] they are full בָנִ֑ים <WH1121> of children וְהִנִּ֥יחוּ <WH3240> and leave יִ֝תְרָ֗ם <WH3499> the rest לְעוֹלְלֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH5768> of their [substance] to their babes

אֲנִ֗י <WH589> in בְּ֭צֶדֶק <WH6664> in righteousness אֶחֱזֶ֣ה <WH2372> As for me I will behold פָנֶ֑יךָ <WH6440> thy face אֶשְׂבְּעָ֥ה <WH7646> I shall be satisfied בְ֝הָקִ֗יץ <WH6974> when I awake תְּמוּנָתֶֽךָ׃ <WH8544> with thy likeness
